p: In general, the participants of both FGDs and IDIs indicated that information regarding dengue is shared by the local health authorities on a regular basis. Because of this, people have become familiar with the disease as well as with necessary preventive measures. However, when it comes to chikungunya, the participants of both FGDs and IDIs were not satisfied with the local health authorities. According to the majority of the participants, the official information regarding chikungunya coming from the local health authorities was late:
